original_text: It is true! Almighty God does not do wicked things. He never refuses to judge people in a fair way. It is true! Almighty God does not do wicked things. He never refuses to judge people in a fair way. It is true! Almighty God does not do wicked things. He never refuses to judge people in a fair way. It is true! Almighty God does not do wicked things.
korean_text: 진실로 하나님은 악을 행하지 아니하시며 전능자는 공의를 굽히지 아니하시느니라

sentences.original_text: Almighty God does not do wicked things.
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 하나님은 악한 일을 하지 않으십니다.

sentences.original_text: He never refuses to judge people in a fair way.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 공정하게 사람들을 판단하기를 거절하지 않으십니다.

sentences.original_text: Almighty God does not do wicked things.
